videos.title: The Others (Short) (2016)
videos.description: Great example of slitscanning in this trippy short by Japanese filmmaker Hiroshi Kondo. From Kondo, "When you are in the crowd, it's absorbed by the energy of the big city, the noise of the city disappears, and you feel like you are alone in this city."
videos.additional_info:
The Others (Short) (2016)
Great example of slitscanning in this trippy short by Japanese filmmaker Hiroshi Kondo. From Kondo, "When you are in the crowd, it's absorbed by the energy of the big city, the noise of the city disappears, and you feel like you are alone in this city."
Technique - Slit-scan
Director - Hiroshi Kondo
DOP - Daisuke Kumagai, Yosuke Sato

videos.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)
videos.description: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

videos.title: The Irrational Fear of Nothing (2016)
videos.description: Follows a paranoid, neurotic man named Terry as he wanders through the streets of Manhattan. Past memories and his irrational inner thoughts soon plague his every move. By channeling a form of mental time travel, he attempts to overcome these past anxieties.
videos.additional_info:
The Irrational Fear of Nothing (2016)
Follows a paranoid, neurotic man named Terry as he wanders through the streets of Manhattan. Past memories and his irrational inner thoughts soon plague his every move. By channeling a form of mental time travel, he attempts to overcome these past anxieties.
Technique - Slit-scan , Snorricam
Director - Paul Trillo
DOP - Ed David
Editor - Paul Trillo
Original Source - Link
